campaign.description: OG GWP Coupon Codes for monthly SOTM bars/cards
20% off + free shipping on orders of $40 or more - August 2020
May 2020 Sitewide Sale - 5/12-5/18 - 20% off + free shipping with code TASTY20
Gift with Purchase + Choice of Gift with Purchase Promotions
Free Shipping on all KIND Breakfast Products

promotion.name: $75+ Snack Club Pricing
promotion.callout-msg: save 16% when you spend $75+
promotion.details: Receive 16% off our kindsnacks.com retail pricing & Free Shipping within the contiguous U.S. on kindsnacks.com orders of $75 or more (before tax). No code required. Offer valid on one-time purchases and initial Snack Club orders only. Valid only on kindsnacks.com. Excludes Wholesale Orders and recurring Snack Club orders. In-stock product only. While supplies last. Offer is non-transferable, has no cash value and cannot be applied to previous purchases or the purchase of gift cards. Void where prohibited by law. Discount will be applied at checkout. Terms of offer are subject to change.

promotion.name: Consensus 15% Off
promotion.details: Take 15% off a single purchase with code CONSENSUS at KINDsnacks.com. Valid only on kindsnacks.com. Discount will not be applied to Snack Club recurring orders. Excludes wholesale orders. Cannot be combined with other offers or promotions. In-stock product only. While supplies last. Offer is non-transferable, has no cash value and cannot be applied to previous purchases or the purchase of gift cards. Limit of one use of promotional code per customer. Void where prohibited by law. To redeem, use code CONSENSUS in your Shopping Cart. Terms of offer are subject to change. Offer ends on 1/31/2020 at 11:59PM PST.

Offer is non-transferable, has no cash value and cannot be applied to previous purchases or the purchase of gift cards. Cannot be combined with other offers. Void where prohibited by law. Terms of offer are subject to change. Offer ends Thursday, August 15th, 2019 11:59pm PST.
